topic.title: How do we update our store policies?

body.p: There is no such thing as a test account for . You must log on using a actual Client card account that is also eligible for rewards points.

The merchant store front pages on contain a link to store policies. We initially obtain store policies as part of the onboarding process. However, if at any time the policies need to be updated, simply send us a request to do so via e-mail. The request should contain what the update is and when it should take effect.
body.note: Once the update has been made in our system, it will appear immediately.
